summary: Enthusiastic customer service and telesales professional with 15+ years of experience across retail, real estate, medical, insurance, and sales. Proven ability in sales, account management, training, conflict resolution, and data/reporting; strong multitasking and communication skills; experienced in call-centers and adapting to various lines of business.

experience.title: CUSTOMER ADVOCATE
experience.description: Handled inbound calls in a call center, assisting members and physicians by responding to telephone and written inquiries. Spent ~90% of time on the phone; worked with CDHP, Medicare, Wellness, and Disease Management. Duties included medical claims billing & coding and medical benefit quotes. Conducted research with knowledge of medical terminology/anatomy; data entry and typing; strong interpersonal, verbal and written communication; analytical and organizational skills; independent decision making.

experience.title: CUSTOMER SERVICE AGENT
experience.description: Greeted and checked-in passengers, assisted with baggage, verified departure documentation, and assisted unaccompanied minors. Complied with security requirements, rescheduled passengers with flight interruptions, and supported international arrivals. Produced required documentation and used carrier-specific reservation/ticketing software; managed scales for weighing baggage; prepared tickets and baggage tags.

experience.title: PATIENT CARE ASSISTANT TECHNICIAN
experience.description: Provided basic patient care including vital signs, input/output, specimen collection and testing, and monitoring patient condition. Assisted with mobility, feeding, IV care, and dressing changes; attended to psyches and escorted patients to treatment areas; performed phlebotomy and EKGs; transported non-critical patients and assisted critical patients; answered phones, located equipment, and maintained documentation and charts.

certifications: PATIENT CARE ASSISTANT TECHNICIAN / CERTIFIED NURSES ASSISTANT
